item.title: OWASP PTK Integration with ZAP
item.description: OWASP PTK is now pre-installed in the browsers launched by ZAP (Chrome, Edge and Firefox). This post shows how to run PTK’s DAST, IAST, SAST, and SCA inside the same authenticated session you’re testing, plus practical JWT and cookie workflows—while ZAP remains your traffic and context hub.
